mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.id FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu sm on sm.id=rm.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} and sm.statu=1
SELECT DISTINCT su.* FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON ur.user_id = su.id WHERE rm.menu_id = #{menuId}
select id,username from sys_user user where id not in ( select user_id from sys_stu stu where stu.statu=1 )

select user.id,user.username from sys_user user inner join sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = user.id inner join sys_role role on role.id=ur.role_id where role.code='admin' and user.statu=1 and role.statu=1

select user.* ,role.id role_id ,role.code role_code ,role.name role_name from sys_user user inner join sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id=user.id inner join sys_role role on role.id=ur.role_id and role.statu=1 where user.username=#{name}
